text:
Dame Ingrid Mary Roscoe, DCVO, FSA (27 May 1944 – 28 June 2020) was an English writer on art. Roscoe was Lord Lieutenant of West Yorkshire from 2004 until 2018. Roscoe was editor-in-chief and co-author of "A Biographical Dictionary of Sculptors in Britain, 1660–1851", published in November 2009.
Roscoe died on 28 June 2020, aged 76.
